author: crossley
msg: Also removed copying and renaming of version-specific sitemaps.

author: crossley
msg: Removed the copying of project-specific *.xmap files by the "copy-sitemap"
target. Since the change to copyless, doing 'forrest war' was causing
the project sitemap.xmap to clobber the main forrest sitemap.

author: niclas
msg: Improvement of the Event model. Events are propagated to the parent, so one can listen for events high up in the hierarchy, instead of many places. Also the removeModel() was fixed so that it traverses its child models and remove the explicitly one by one.
